content: X-DH Data cable hook Data cable hook for supporting cable bundles on walls or ceilings ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Time-saving solution – data cable hooks delivered ready to install using powder-actuated tools Plenum-rated plastic saddle – increases the bearing surface area to provide the optimal bending radius and support for data cable bundles Self-closing mechanism – designed for easier, more productive cable hanging Baseplate designed to fit DX 351 fastener guide for more reliable installation Virtually dust-free solution – no drilling required Applications Support for high-performance data cable bundles Support for sensitive wiring and low-voltage cables Support for cables in air handling (plenum-rated) spaces ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Conduit Fastening, Cable Fastenings Material: Carbon steel, Polyamide (PA), Flame-retardant, Plenum rated Base materials: Concrete Technical Data | Application | Conduit Fastening, Cable Fastenings | Material | Carbon steel, Polyamide (PA), Flame-retardant, Plenum rated | Base materials | Concrete | Approvals (global) | UL | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2230610 - 2 Data hook for ceiling applications - Package Size 50 pc - 2230611 - 2 Data hook for wall applications - Package Size 50 pc - 2230612 - 4 Data hook for wall applications - Package Size 25 pc
